Producer: Declan Baldwin, Jason Kliot, Joana Vicente, Danny Leiner
Synopsis: Tonya Neeley (Viola Davis), a resident of one of her city's most crime-ridden housing projects, circulates a petition to get the complex torn down and replaced with better housing. The worlds of the poor and the privileged collide when she decides that the signature she needs most is that of the project's original designer, wealthy Leo Waters (Anthony LaPaglia).
Title: The Architect
